theBrewmaster:CelestialBrew.NAME: Celestial Brew
theBrewmaster:CelestialBrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Discard your hand. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:Microbrew.NAME: Microbrew
theBrewmaster:Microbrew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Permanently transforms into a random common Brew card when upgraded.

theBrewmaster:QuickSip.NAME: Quick Sip
theBrewmaster:QuickSip.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: Draw a card.

theBrewmaster:PerplexingBrew.NAME: Perplexing Brew
theBrewmaster:PerplexingBrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength, Thorns, or Dexterity, chosen at random when played.
theBrewmaster:PerplexingBrew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain 2{!Location!|>0,<0= Strength, Thorns, or Dexterity, chosen at random when drawn.|0= }{!M!|@=|0=Strength.|1=Thorns.|2=Dexterity.}

theBrewmaster:DoubleFist.NAME: Double Fist
theBrewmaster:DoubleFist.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next Brew card is played twice.

theBrewmaster:FluidMotion.NAME: Fluid Motion
theBrewmaster:FluidMotion.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, consume 10% of your thebrewmaster:Intoxication and gain it as Block.

theBrewmaster:Homebrew.NAME: Homebrew
theBrewmaster:Homebrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. This card gains !theBrewmaster:M2! thebrewmaster:Intoxication when drawn until played.

theBrewmaster:Belch.NAME: Belch
theBrewmaster:Belch.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak. NL Exhaust unless thebrewmaster:Intoxicated.

theBrewmaster:DrunkenFist.NAME: Drunken Fist
theBrewmaster:DrunkenFist.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Consume 10% of your intoxication. Deal {!M!|2=[#7fff00]twice[] }that much damage.

theBrewmaster:FortifyingBrew.NAME: Fortifying Brew
theBrewmaster:FortifyingBrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: Gain double that amount instead.

theBrewmaster:SoberUp.NAME: Sober Up
theBrewmaster:SoberUp.DESCRIPTION: Consume 100% of your thebrewmaster:Intoxication. Gain [E] and draw 1 card for every !M! consumed. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:DrunkenIdea.NAME: Drunken Idea
theBrewmaster:DrunkenIdea.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard 1 card. Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: NL Draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s}, discard 1 card instead.

theBrewmaster:Stagger.NAME: Stagger
theBrewmaster:Stagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemy intends to attack, stun them.

theBrewmaster:PurifyingBrew.NAME: Purifying Brew
theBrewmaster:PurifyingBrew.DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. If it is a Status card, gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication.
theBrewmaster:PurifyingBrew.UPGRADED_DESCRIPTION: Discard a card. If it is a [#7fff00]Status or Curse[] card, gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication.

theBrewmaster:PocketFlask.NAME: Pocket Flask
theBrewmaster:PocketFlask.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Brew, gain 10 thebrewmaster:Intoxication.

theBrewmaster:KSKeg.NAME: Keg
theBrewmaster:KSKeg.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL Add 1 [#edc651]Smash[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theBrewmaster:KSKeg.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL Add 1 [#7fff00]Smash+[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:KSKegP.NAME: Keg
theBrewmaster:KSKegP.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL Add 1 [#edc651]Smash[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theBrewmaster:KSKegP.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL Add 1 [#7fff00]Smash+[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:KSSmash.NAME: Smash
theBrewmaster:KSSmash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 [#edc651]Keg[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theBrewmaster:KSSmash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 [#7fff00]Keg+[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:KSSmashP.NAME: Smash
theBrewmaster:KSSmashP.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 [#edc651]Keg[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theBrewmaster:KSSmashP.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 [#7fff00]Keg+[] to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:Binge.NAME: Binge
theBrewmaster:Binge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block and thebrewmaster:Intoxication. Add a copy of this card with Ethereal and Exhaust to your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block and thebrewmaster:Intoxication. Add a copy of this card to your hand.

theBrewmaster:HaveLaugh.NAME: Have a Laugh
theBrewmaster:HaveLaugh.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. Reduce the cost of Brew cards in your hand by 1 this turn.

theBrewmaster:CrazyBrew.NAME: Crazy Brew
theBrewmaster:CrazyBrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL Next turn gain [E].
theBrewmaster:CrazyBrew.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! thebrewmaster:Intoxication. NL Next turn gain [E] [E].

theBrewmaster:AdmiralsBrew.NAME: Admiral's Brew
theBrewmaster:AdmiralsBrew.DESCRIPTION: Prevent all unblocked damage taken by half. Take prevented damage at the end of combat.

theBrewmaster:CinderBrew.NAME: Cinder Brew
theBrewmaster:CinderBrew.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack does !M! additional damage.

theBrewmaster:FairyBrew.NAME: Fairy Brew
theBrewmaster:FairyBrew.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. NL thebrewmaster:Intoxicated: Gain !M2! life instead. NL Exhaust.

theBrewmaster:ExplodingKeg.NAME: Exploding Keg
theBrewmaster:ExplodingKeg.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy and !M! damage to the rest.

theBrewmaster:ThunderClap.NAME: Thunder Clap
theBrewmaster:ThunderClap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.

theBrewmaster:Vasoimmolation.NAME: Vasoimmolation
theBrewmaster:Vasoimmolation.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M!% of your thebrewmaster:Intoxication as damage to yourself and all enemies.
theBrewmaster:Vasoimmolation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal !M!% of your thebrewmaster:Intoxication as damage to [#7fff00]all enemies.[]
